mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.personid AS "personid", a.officeid AS "officeid", a.officename AS "officename", a.review_type AS "reviewType", a.year AS "year", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.result AS "result", a.status AS "status", a.hold1 AS "hold1", a.hold2 AS "hold2", a.hold3 AS "hold3", a.hold4 AS "hold4", a.hold5 AS "hold5"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO dem_score( id, personid, officeid, officename, review_type, year, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, result, status, hold1, hold2, hold3, hold4, hold5 ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{personid}, #{officeid}, #{officename}, #{reviewType}, #{year}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{result}, #{status}, #{hold1}, #{hold2}, #{hold3}, #{hold4}, #{hold5} )
mapper.update: UPDATE dem_score SET personid = #{personid}, officeid = #{officeid}, officename = #{officename}, review_type = #{reviewType}, year = #{year}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, result = #{result}, status = #{status}, hold1 = #{hold1}, hold2 = #{hold2}, hold3 = #{hold3}, hold4 = #{hold4}, hold5 = #{hold5} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.parent_id AS "parent.id", a.parent_ids, a.code, a.name, a.sort, a.type, a.remarks, a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date, a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date, a.del_flag FROM sys_area a WHERE a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} and parent_id in('2','3') ORDER BY a.code
SELECT a.type FROM sys_office a WHERE a.del_flag = '0' AND a.area_id = #{id} and ISNULL(type)=0 and LENGTH(trim(type))>0 AND a.type<>'无' GROUP BY a.type

SELECT count(DISTINCT type) AS "email" FROM sys_office a WHERE a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} and type !='无' AND ISNULL(type) = 0 AND LENGTH(trim(type)) > 0
AND a.area_id = #{area.id}
